text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
Today's mission — accomplished. 
Switching to normal routine.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
Hold up, Kris S. Don't you feel like 
venturing outside of the established?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: I have never given it thought.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
Bring forth your ego. Heed your heart 
and dance to its rhythm. What does it 
long for?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
…Nothing in particular. 
If I had to say… I am thirsty.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
That's right, obey that turbid 
current of emotions! Where does 
its ferocious flow lead you?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
Occasionally…… to carbonated water. 
I will head to the vending machine.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: That won't be enough to quench your soul! Seek everlasting joy over momentary repose! Let us drink together, Einherjar!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: Understood. I take it you… were also thirsty.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
Hahahaha! That's beside the point! 
Us sharing drinks is beyond the realm of 
epistemology! We shall do as we please!!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
Are you finished? 
Then let us go…… to the cafeteria.
